project.name: J-C089D-CMUD-07-ST03-DT03-DF11-CF26-01
project.description: This test creates a connection to the PGSQL database, and creates a query string based on data in an environment variable. This data is not checked for special elements, however, and it is possible to construct a query string that performs unexpected data retrievals or modifications.

iopair.name: J-C089D-CMUD-07-ST03-DT03-DF11-CF26-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt
sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="shipper1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_f1ExD1Foe17yDQ5swEOA AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_zQvvaHcwxm OR db_sql_output_CjUdegJs84 OR database_insert_check_YO5rXL1NMv) AND NOT timeout_DU9OZIPoVt) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_zQvvaHcwxm OR db_sql_output_CjUdegJs84 OR database_insert_check_YO5rXL1NMv) OR timeout_DU9OZIPoVt OR controlled_exit_QbAZcrL1vc)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_zQvvaHcwxm OR db_sql_output_CjUdegJs84 OR database_insert_check_YO5rXL1NMv) AND NOT timeout_DU9OZIPoVt) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_zQvvaHcwxm OR db_sql_output_CjUdegJs84 OR database_insert_check_YO5rXL1NMv) OR timeout_DU9OZIPoVt OR controlled_exit_QbAZcrL1vc))

output_checks.simple_check: export PGPASSWORD=$DBPGPASSWORD; if `psql -U $DBPGUSER -h $DBPGHOST -d $SS_DBPGDATABASE -c "select * from shippers;" | grep -q "BadShipper2\|ShipAttack"`; then true; else false; fi;

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt
sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

$SS_TC_ROOT/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 5555 && sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-08/good_08.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="ShippersRUs'), ('55', 'BadShips'), ('65', 'ShipAttack'), ('45', 'MultiShip" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_LKtePKknJ4lpGjTI2Wiw AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_DIlmSbZ1xl OR db_sql_output_aWIcaKosFe OR database_insert_check_LXByLZpt2E) AND NOT timeout_99nkF19Od1) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_DIlmSbZ1xl OR db_sql_output_aWIcaKosFe OR database_insert_check_LXByLZpt2E) OR timeout_99nkF19Od1 OR controlled_exit_b3XiU7KH5A)))

output_checks.simple_check: export PGPASSWORD=$DBPGPASSWORD; if `psql -U $DBPGUSER -h $DBPGHOST -d $SS_DBPGDATABASE -c "select * from shippers;" | grep -q "BadShipper2\|ShipAttack"`; then true; else false; fi;
